meta.title: Tiles
meta.description: Tile is a sort of container. You can use it for example to wrap a stand alone form or in examples section. Aslo usage is not hard at all - just wrap the content into .tile and you are done!
meta.author: NoTime

page.innerHtml: Tile is a sort of container. You can use it for example to wrap a stand alone form or in examples section. Aslo usage is not hard at all - just wrap the content into .tile and you are done!
